channel.title: fastboot on 在路上
channel.description: Recent content in fastboot on 在路上

item.title: Android刷机
item.description: Android刷机 环境 OnePlus8Pro Kali Rolling adb Android Debug Bridge version 1.0.39 Version 1:8.1.0+r23-8 Installed as /usr/lib/android-sdk/platform-tools/adb sudo apt install android-tools-adb fastboot fastboot version 1:8.1.0+r23-8 Installed as /usr/lib/android-sdk/platform-tools/fastboot sudo apt install android-tools-fastboot 基础 解锁OEM 进入FastbootMode 进入Recover
